an9.19:1.1: “Imanca, bhikkhave, rattim sambahula devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho, bhikkhave, ta devata mam etadavocum:
an9.19:1.2: ‘upasankamimsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhutanam pabbajita agarani.
an9.19:1.3: Te mayam, bhante, paccutthimha, no ca kho abhivadimha.
an9.19:1.4: Ta mayam, bhante, aparipunnakammanta vippatisariniyo paccanutapiniyo hinam kayam upapanna’ti.
an9.19:2.1: Aparapi mam, bhikkhave, sambahula devata upasankamitva etadavocum:
an9.19:2.2: ‘upasankamimsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhutanam pabbajita agarani.
an9.19:2.3: Te mayam, bhante, paccutthimha abhivadimha, no ca tesam asanam adamha.
an9.19:2.4: Ta mayam, bhante, aparipunnakammanta vippatisariniyo paccanutapiniyo hinam kayam upapanna’ti.
an9.19:3.1: Aparapi mam, bhikkhave, sambahula devata upasankamitva etadavocum:
an9.19:3.2: ‘upasankamimsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhutanam pabbajita agarani.
an9.19:3.3: Te mayam, bhante, paccutthimha abhivadimha asanam adamha, no ca kho yathasatti yathabalam samvibhajimha …pe…
an9.19:3.4: yathasatti yathabalam samvibhajimha, no ca kho upanisidimha dhammassavanaya …pe…
an9.19:3.5: upanisidimha dhammassavanaya, no ca kho ohitasota dhammam sunimha …pe…
an9.19:3.6: ohitasota ca dhammam sunimha, no ca kho sutva dhammam dharayimha …pe…
an9.19:3.7: sutva ca dhammam dharayimha, no ca kho dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhimha …pe…
an9.19:3.8: dhatananca dhammanam attham upaparikkhimha, no ca kho atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammam patipajjimha.
an9.19:3.9: Ta mayam, bhante, aparipunnakammanta vippatisariniyo paccanutapiniyo hinam kayam upapanna’ti.
an9.19:4.1: Aparapi mam, bhikkhave, sambahula devata upasankamitva etadavocum:
an9.19:4.2: ‘upasankamimsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhutanam pabbajita agarani.
an9.19:4.3: Te mayam, bhante, paccutthimha abhivadimha, asanam adamha, yathasatti yathabalam samvibhajimha, upanisidimha dhammassavanaya, ohitasota ca dhammam sunimha, sutva ca dhammam dharayimha, dhatananca dhammanam attham upaparikkhimha, atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammam patipajjimha.
an9.19:4.4: Ta mayam, bhante, paripunnakammanta avippatisariniyo apaccanutapiniyo panitam kayam upapanna’ti.
an9.19:4.5: Etani, bhikkhave, rukkhamulani etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha, bhikkhave, ma pamadattha, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha seyyathapi ta purimika devata”ti.
